Class MolecularOrbitals

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.chemistry.computational.MolecularOrbitals
public class MolecularOrbitals extends Object
Molecular orbital calculations using Hückel theory. Hückel MO theory is a simple LCAO method for conjugated π systems. Secular equation: |H - ES| = 0 * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

      public MolecularOrbitals(double alpha, double beta)

  • Method Details

    • linearChainEnergies

      public double[] linearChainEnergies(int numAtoms)
      Calculates π-electron energies for a linear conjugated chain. E_k = α + 2β·cos(kπ/(n+1)) for k = 1, 2, ..., n
      Parameters:
      numAtoms - Number of sp² carbon atoms
      Returns:
      Array of orbital energies (lowest first)

    • cyclicEnergies

      public double[] cyclicEnergies(int numAtoms)
      Calculates π-electron energies for a cyclic conjugated system. E_k = α + 2β·cos(2πk/n) for k = 0, 1, ..., n-1
      Parameters:
      numAtoms - Number of atoms in the ring
      Returns:
      Array of orbital energies

    • totalPiEnergy

      public double totalPiEnergy(double[] orbitalEnergies, int numElectrons)
      Calculates total π-electron energy for a system.
      Parameters:
      orbitalEnergies - Orbital energies
      numElectrons - Number of π electrons
      Returns:
      Total π-electron energy

    • delocalizationEnergy

      public double delocalizationEnergy(double actualEnergy, int numDoubleBonds)
      Calculates delocalization energy (resonance stabilization). DE = E_π(actual) - E_π(localized)
      Parameters:
      actualEnergy - Total π energy from Hückel
      numDoubleBonds - Number of isolated double bonds in reference
      Returns:
      Delocalization energy

    • homoLumoGap

      public double homoLumoGap(double[] orbitalEnergies, int numElectrons)
      HOMO-LUMO gap (frontier orbital energy difference).
      Parameters:
      orbitalEnergies - Sorted orbital energies
      numElectrons - Number of electrons
      Returns:
      HOMO-LUMO gap

    • isAromatic

      public static boolean isAromatic(int numPiElectrons)
      Checks if a cyclic system satisfies Hückel's rule (aromatic). 4n+2 π electrons = aromatic

    • isAntiaromatic

      public static boolean isAntiaromatic(int numPiElectrons)
      Checks if antiaromatic (4n π electrons).

      public double[] benzeneEnergies()
      Benzene: 6 carbon ring, 6 π electrons
